segments.text: I'm simply observing the details of this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is drying a plate near an overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is clearly visible streaming over the basin's edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are positioned near an open cabinet on the opposite wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One boy is on a wobbly stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is looking up, seemingly waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman appears entirely unaware of both the water and the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is solely on the dish towel and the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such an obvious hazard being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of vigilance in this situation is quite astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden is neat and orderly, a stark contrast to the interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene suggests a significant lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don't understand how one could be so completely distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR
